page.title: 02On living here
page.content: Our area is in the Cotswold Hills.I like the Cotswolds because it is mostly unspoiled countryside.The hills are not flat but there are valleys, streams and springs and it is quiet, very quiet because there are not many roads.There is one big main road but all the others are small and winding. Our area is mostly covered in fields and you can see lots of animals like deer, rabbits and pheasants. The farmers put hay bales out for the deer.There are lots of fossils.Most of them are prints. I love the country.I would not leave it for anything.
